features: 【STABLE & RELIABLE】This tripod has a 4-segment column leg with quick release lever lock, which allows you to adjust the working height from 17" to 55" in a few seconds, which is enough to support the heaviest smartphone or small camera, and the maximum weight is up to 3 pounds.

【COMPACT & LIGHTWEIGHT】The weight is only 1.3 pounds, and the height ranges from 17 inches to 55 inches in a short period of time. The tripod can be folded to 17.3 inches short, can be put into a suitcase or backpack, plus a portable travel bag, suitable for lectures, classroom presentations, competitions, travel, blogs, selfies, portrait or landscape photography.

The tripod is equipped with a mobile phone holder, which can be adjusted between 3.3-3.93 inches to fit most smartphones and mobile phone cases. Remote shutter can perform wireless shooting within a distance of 10 m / 33 ft, which is very suitable for remote shooting.

【360 DEGREE PANORAMIC】The three-way rotating pan/tilt can be rotated 360 degrees, and the angle can be adjusted freely, allowing you to take panoramic photos/videos without restrictions. The non-slip and scratch-resistant rubber feet provide a stable standing state and protect your phone from falling and damage.
【WHAT YOU GET】-A Lightweight Tripod; Carry Bag; Phone holder;If you find that the accessories are missing in the package, please contact us immediately.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: This cell phone tripod can free your hands and shoot freely, which is a must-have for summer travel. This portable tripod allows you to shoot on IOS and Android phones.Multi-angle rotation and flexible adjustment allow you to control any shooting angle you want and easily record your best state.

Multifunctional Tripod Stand Universal Compatibility It works with iphone/android smart phones and most camcorders, digital cameras, cameras, projectors, etc. Various Occasions The 360 ​​omnidirectional tripod head allows you to capture the perfect photo from every angle and capture the best moments. Perfect for selfies, family record photos,live streaming,vlogging, etc.

Flexible Adjustment The three-way rotating gimbal design can quickly rotate the phone screen horizontally and vertically. So it can meet your needs for different angles and fields of view. Stable and Reliable With 3-section column legs with quick release lever lock, it can strengthen the load-bearing capacity of the tripod, making it more stable and not easy to shake. Easy To Carry The cell phone tripod can be put into a backpack after being folded, which is small and portable, and does not take up space. It's perfect for travel and carry around. Adjustable Length Adjustable length provides more possibilities for taking pictures to capture a wider field of view.
You can shoot freely within 10m, and easily take photos with friends or family members in the distance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Just unboxed my tripod and I already love this product! Great value, lightweight, portable, well constructed, and sturdy for daily indoor use. The tripod is best suited for phone, go-pro, and indoor shoots. This is not meant for DSLRs or any other purpose such as plein air setup, projector mount stand, etc. The remote setup was easy, and it works as desired. Love the on-off switch on the side, the blue light on remote for pairing and the use is pretty straightforward and simple. The tripod setup is very easy and does not require an instruction manual. Just screw the phone mount and you are good to go. It has a pan head to shoot either in portrait or landscape mode. It comes with screw down clamp for the phone mount instead of the clasp, which I absolutely love. I regularly record cooking videos, and have tried various other phone mounts in the past including clasp and retractable styled and they have mostly been annoying or unreliable. This one provides incredible stability. At it's full length the tripod may seem slightly unstable, but as long as you stick to using this for phone and indoor shooting, it will work as intended. Pleased with the purchase. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Compact and very easy to use! Purchased to take some group family photos on the beach with cell phone. Was quick and easy to pop open. Snuggly held phone and was very sturdy. Carrying case and remote are a nice bonus!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very light and very sturdy
reviews.reviewText: It's so light and easy to carry, but when deployed, it seems strong and sturdy. I thought this was a great value. I didn't know how to make the remote work, but I don't care.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good, but not perfect
reviews.reviewText: For the price, it's a good tripod. Holds the phone firmly, has adjustable legs , and many ways to adjust the angles. It's not very tall though, and it easily tips over if slightly imbalanced, due to it's very light weight nature. For standard photography or gym setups surely good enough, but for anything more professional you'll need something more sturdy and firm.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This works wonderful. It is easy to use and a great value for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Just as pictured. Sturdy and light weight. Really great product and buy overall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars AMAZING for the price. I'm highly impressed
reviews.reviewText: This tripod is amazingly sturdy for a phone and I love the screw based phone mount rather than those janky spring loaded ones. This one allows you to really tighten down on your device, even has silicone pads to protect the sides of the phone. Quick release to remove the whole mount. and the tube metal is a lot heavier than some of the other ones. So far this is the best investment for a tripod to use for your phone. And the remote (only tested on iphone so far) can snap a pic, or start/stop video. and the bluetooth connect to the phone is fast and simple.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Tripod: great, Remote: awful
reviews.reviewText: The tripod itself is really nice, much better quality than I was expecting. I can’t wait to actually use it. However, the button it comes with will not work, it will not connect to any device I try to pair it to no matter what I do.
